title: Application & Data Security
caption: Minimize the risk of possible exploitation of essential data
overview: With numerous apps launched in the market every day, it has become crucial to ensure safety from vulnerabilities in the market. Application and Data security involve the use of security measures at the application level to prevent the data and code within the app from being hacked. We use multiple resources like accidental risk assessments, encryption testing, access rights and more to ensure user and developer data protection during the development phase and also after the deployment.

services.title: Source Code Review
services.content: We analyze the source code developed for any issues that may allow a hacker to crack into an application, business process or program. This step involves thorough scans of high risk areas of code which otherwise is a more complex and expensive process manually.

services.title: Data Leakage Prevention
services.content: The main motive of this solution is to ensure the organizationâ€™s confidential data or vital information remains within the network by restricting its transfer to external users. Our experts also ensure software products are implemented to track what data end users can send to network administrators.

services.title: Application Protection
services.content: This feature enables prevention from cyber-attackers by blocking their access to sensitive information and operations which could potentially lead to harming the company.

services.title: Data Protection and RM
services.content: When it comes to protecting your data, there is a heavy reliance on risk management as it's a critical tool to ensure that the data are processed appropriately to protect the privacy of individuals effectively.

services.title: Encryption Solution
services.content: We use top-notch solutions that ensure sensitive data is encrypted and can be read-only by trusted parties. Our process involves multi-layer encryption, which includes disks, files, databases, etc.

services.title: Identify and Classify
services.content: Our team offers you assistance to easily identify data that needs an appropriate level of protection while warning others and auto triggering system protections to secure it. This allows individuals and systems to then work together to reduce risk and meet compliance standards. We believe in a comprehensive classification system for reliable operations.
